analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/11/0xdfc3e857c8ccea7657e0ed98ab92e048e38dee0f.sol#486-488) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/11/0xdfc3e857c8ccea7657e0ed98ab92e048e38dee0f.sol#502-507)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/11/0xdfc3e857c8ccea7657e0ed98ab92e048e38dee0f.sol#514-520)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/11/0xdfc3e857c8ccea7657e0ed98ab92e048e38dee0f.sol#525-534)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/11/0xdfc3e857c8ccea7657e0ed98ab92e048e38dee0f.sol#536-540)
AddressUtils.isContract (/unique_chucks/11/0xdfc3e857c8ccea7657e0ed98ab92e048e38dee0f.sol#654-677) is declared view but contains assembly code

FidelityHouseToken.lockedBalanceOf (/unique_chucks/11/0xdfc3e857c8ccea7657e0ed98ab92e048e38dee0f.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= lockedUntil (/unique_chucks/11/0xdfc3e857c8ccea7657e0ed98ab92e048e38dee0f.sol)

AddressUtils.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/11/0xdfc3e857c8ccea7657e0ed98ab92e048e38dee0f.sol#654-677)
	- /unique_chucks/11/0xdfc3e857c8ccea7657e0ed98ab92e048e38dee0f.sol#674-677
